thread.title: Vedhalam Teaser Gets Over 2 Million Hits in 1 Day
thread.title_full: Vedhalam Teaser Gets Over 2 Million Hits in 1 Day

title: Vedhalam Teaser Gets Over 2 Million Hits in 1 Day
text:
Photos A screen grab from the official trailer 
The first official teaser of Actor Ajith's Vedalam, which was released on Wednesday, seems to be evoking a phenomenal response on YouTube and other social networking platforms. Within a day, the teaser received a whopping 16,000 likes and over 21 lakh hits on YouTube alone. The numbers seem to be growing. 
The film, which has Ajith and Shruti Haasan in the lead, has been directed by Siruthai Siva and has music scored by Anirudh. The teaser, which is around 45 seconds long, shows Ajith performing some daring stunts and saying, Therika Vidalama. The teaser also goes on to assert that the film will explode like firecrackers on the screens on Deepavali.
